item.description:
Our 2nd "Afterwork" of the month.

Come and join Sitz members and guests at this new, retro, wonderful Blue Martini Bar located next to Siros on the board walk at Marina Bay. The Blue Martini Bar is directly behind the gazebo on the boardwalk. It is a perfect gathering spot during the summer months.

Pray for good weather!!

Sitz will welcome you with appetizers (come early for best selection), you will be responsible for your own liquid libations ("liberations")

Looking forward to seeing you there!!

 

Directions 

From the North:

Take 93S to Quincy/Neponset exit 12. Bear right at the yellow flashing light. Go over the Neponset River Bridge and follow the signs to Squantum. Keep to the left over the bridge where the construction is going on. Follow the road to the second set of lights (Dunkin Donuts will be on the left) and take a left turn. Go about 1/4 mile and take a left at the Marina Bay sign.

 

From the South:

Take 93N to Granite Street, exit 11. Go to the second set of lights and take a right on Gallivan Boulevard. Follow the signs to 3A south over the Neponset River Bridge and follow the signs to Squantum. Then, follow the directions above.

 

Parking is available way over to the left as you drive in. There is also valet parking at the Blue Martini Bar directly in front of you as you drive down Victory Road.

  Who's Registered
item.name: A summer evening on the seashore....Sallys selling seashells welcome ?;-)
